data.text: Dagheba aghungamin dughiamɨn, ia amozim bagh Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn azangsɨgh.
Gumazamiziba, me gɨn otivamin bizibagh foghasa, aseba ko kukunir gumazibar azangsɨsi.
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei,
Eghtɨ Judan anababar tongɨn, gumazir dapanir gavgavir maba otivam,
Me mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavibar mɨn uari inigh, uan apaniba abɨntɨ,
“Kɨ Judan gumazamizibar amightɨ, me bar gavgavigham.
Israelian gumazamiziba me mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavibar mɨn otivigh
Kɨ guizbangɨra me batuegha me aghamsɨki,
Nan gumazamizir Isip ko, Asirian kantrin itiba,
Kɨ me inightɨ me uamategh uan nguibamɨn izam,
Kɨ uan gumazamizibar amightɨ me gavgavigham.
